Custom Sizes Available On This Product

MDFFABRICATION BOARD

Sheet Plastics are the UK'S largest online plastic sheet stockist. Offering our customers a large range of plastic sheet products which include Acrylic sheet, Polycarbonate sheet, Foam pvc sheet, Aluminium composite sheet, and many other plastic sheet products. All of our products are produced to your exact specification, simply tell us the sizes you require and get your instant online price. We are also able to offer our customers a range of bespoke options on all of our plastic sheets which include drilling holes, polishing and cutting specific shapes or profiles.

Sheet Plastics are the UK'S largest online plastic sheet stockist. Offering our customers a large range of plastic sheet products which include Acrylic sheet, Polycarbonate sheet, Foam pvc sheet, Aluminium composite sheet, and many other plastic sheet products. All of our products are produced to your exact specification, simply tell us the sizes you require and get your instant online price. We are also able to offer our customers a range of bespoke options on all of our plastic sheets which include drilling holes, polishing and cutting specific shapes or profiles.

Section 1.10.32 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum", written by Cicero in 45 BC

We offer our customers an excellent delivery service including next day delivery, specified delivery dates and economy deliveries. All of our products carry a price match guarantee and all of our staff are fully trained in all of our products. To complement our range of products we offer a full range of accessories which include plastic polishes, plastic glues, secondary glazing systems and plastic scratch removers.

1914 translation by H. Rackham

We also offer a no quibble returns policy, if you are unhappy with purchase simply return it is and we will give you a full refund. The Sheet Plastics website has been operating for over 5 years and we have over 50,000 happy customers.

Section 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum", written by Cicero in 45 BC
